User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://sulyprettynails.com/sitemap.xml

# Disallow admin areas
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /.env
Disallow: /node_modules/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /
Allow: /servicios
Allow: /galeria
Allow: /contacto
Allow: /reservas

# Crawl delay
Crawl-delay: 1
